configuration_schema_description: The configuration schema defines the structure of settings for this module.
dependencies_description: Dependencies determine which other modules must be enabled for this module to function.
label: Label
no_fields_defined: No fields defined yet. Add your first field to begin.
select_a_module: Select a module to add as dependency
no_dependencies: No dependencies added yet. This module will function independently.
dependencies_explanation: When a module has dependencies, those modules must be enabled for this module to function. If you add dependencies, the system will automatically enforce this relationship when assigning modules to plans or tenants.
error_saving_module_message: An error occurred while saving the module. Please try again.
